name: montresor
description: A B O U T D E S I G N
full_text: A B O U T D E S I G N Knitting small pieces like this pouch always brings me back to nostalgia of my childhood with my grandma Marcelle, who gave me her leftover yarns to learn. For me these leftover skeins were always treasures. MONTRESOR pouch is a fun and very cute little project. It is a very quick knit for your holidays and to start your Christmas gifts. Y A R N KNITTING FOR OLIVE one strand of merino held with one strand of soft silk mohair (Cream col.) 1 ball of each N O T I O N S 1 unique stitch marker 3 unique removable stitch markers 1 tapestry needle N E E D L E S 4mm circular needles 60cm and 4mm DPN to achieve straps G A U G E 22 sts x 32 sts in pattern Free patterns are for personal use only. No help will be provide. Thank you for your understanding. Les patrons gratuits sont à usage personnel uniquement. Aucune aide ne sera apportée à leurs réalisations, merci de votre compréhension.
